title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and eventual redemption.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham into chaos.

title: The Godfather Part II
description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone and his son Michael's expansion of the family business.

title: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland, Oskar Schindler becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the world of men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and others intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek Hobbit sets out on a journey to destroy the One Ring.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club with a soap maker.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers the nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
